metadata.title: CVE-2017-12133 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the clntudp_call function in sunrpc/clnt_udp.c in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before 2.26 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to error path.

notes.note: chrisccoulson> The CVE description doesn't seem to match the description in the linked bug report and upstream patch sbeattie> introduced in CVE-2016-4429 fix

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26-0ubuntu2').
